headline: January 2026 Monthly Release
summary: The Allstate Corporation (NYSE: ALL) today announced estimated catastrophe losses for the month of January of $175 million or $138 million, after-tax, primarily related to Winter Storm Fern.

raw.headline: January 2026 Monthly Release

headline: Allstate Declares $175M January Catastrophe Losses In SEC Filing
